title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. title: 2021 GIANT STANCE E+2 29ER
text: Steep climbs, technical descents, longer days on the trail. With a smooth suspension setup and a seamless boost of pedaling support, this E-bike gives you the power and technology to ride the trails you dream about.Designed with trail-friendly geometry, Stance E+ helps beginner or intermediate trail riders experience off-road E-bike riding at its best. Its lightweight, strong and stiff ALUXX SL aluminum frame with FlexPoint suspension makes tricky singletrack trails easier to ride. It features 120mm of rear suspension travel and 130mm up front, plus the stable, nimble ride quality of 29-inch wheels. The SyncDrive Sport motor delivers 350 percent tunable support ratios through the Giant E-bike App. The new RideControl ONE with EVO display compatibility has integrated handlebar support buttons for improved ergonomic control. The EnergyPak battery system lets you extend the ride, and now you can charge it up quickly with a newly designed smart charger.MotorGiant SyncDrive SportControllerGiant RideControl One ANT+DisplayWireless display compatibleBatteryGiant EnergyPak Smart 500, 36V Integrated Lithium-IonSizesS, M, L, XLColorsBalsam GreenFrameALUXX SL-grade aluminum, 120mm FlexPoint suspension systemForkSR Suntour XCR 34 Air LO-R, 130mm travel, tapered steerer, Lockout, 110x15 Quick-Loc thru-axleShockRockShox Monarch R, High Volume, 184x44mm, custom tunedHandlebarGiant Connect TR Riser 31.8x780mmStemGiant ContactSeatpostGiant 30.9mm, 2-bolt Micro Adjustable, Forged AluminiumSaddleGiant SportPedalsAluminum PlatformShiftersShimano DeoreFront DerailleurGiant Custom Chain GuideRear DerailleurShimano Deore, 10-Speed, Shadow+BrakesTektro HD-M745 Orion, 4-piston, hydraulic disc, 203mmBrake LeversTektro HD-M745 OrionCassetteShimano CS-M4100-10, 11-46T, 10-SpeedChainKMC e.10 Sport, e-bike optimizedCranksetForged Alloy minimal Q-factor, 36T Steel Direct Mount ring (S:160, M/L:165, XL:170)Bottom BracketN/ARimsGiant XCT 29 Tubeless Ready 25mm e-bike optimizedHubsGiant eTracker Sport, [F] 15mm Thru-Axle [R] 141mm QRSpokesStainless SteelTiresMaxxis Rekon 29x2.4" foldable, 60tpi, EXO, Tubeless ReadyExtrasGiant EnergyPak 6A Smart chargerWeightThe most accurate way to determine any bike’s weight is to have your local dealer weigh it for you. Many brands strive to list the lowest possible weight, but in reality weight can vary based on size, finish, hardware and accessories. title: Fuzion Cityglide Adult Kick Scooter (Green)
text:
Used Adult scooter. 

CityGlide by NextSport is the premier line of cruising BIG WHEEL Scooters. Great for last mile commuting and perfect for just getting out and having fun! This Scooter is your first choice of transportation on the go. Its lightweight and low-to-the-ground deck structure and oversized polyurethane tires provide a stable smooth ride even on bumpy city side walks. On top of that, the easy folding mechanism allows you to take Cityglide any and everywhere. CityGlide is suitable for ALL AGES but it is the ideal scooter for adults and teens due to its comfortable ride height. Great for college students! SUPPORTS RIDERS up to 220lbs!Foldable, and with big 200mm Wheels, you may not be grabbing big air anytime soon – but you’ll get where you need to be, fast.

title: Trek 6000
text: 26” Trek 6000 in very good condition. This bike has received many useful upgrades such as a chainstay protector, new grips and new alloy pedals. The hydraulic disk brakes have been bled, the fork has been serviced and the front derailleur has been adjusted. The tires are like new. This bike has a Shimano XT drivetrain, Shimano Alivio cranks and Shimano hydraulic disk brakes with a 180mm rotor in the front and a 160mm in the back. This bike is roughly a medium frame and would be perfect for anyone somewhat between 1.5m to 1.75m. It has been thoroughly tuned up and is ready to run.

The 24" wheelset is newly built with Shimano XT hubs and Sun Ringle wide rims (can be converted to tubeless if required.) Shimano SLX 10sp drivetrain with clutch rear mech means no dropped chain. Cassettes and chain in good as new condition. Avid Elixir disc brakes bring it all to a stop. Truvativ crank, Easton handlebar, Fizik Saddle.Bike is available for viewing at Cranx in Sun Valley during shop hours. Price neg on viewing. If the ad is up then the bike is available.

title: Sidi Dragon 2 Carbon SRS Mountain Bike Cleats, Size UK 12. - SAVE R2,300!
text:
Item: Mountain Bike shoes and cleats

Brand: Sidi Dragon 2

Condition: Good

Size: UK 12

Price Gain: you will pay around R3,000.00 for a new pair of these shoes

Additional Info:

Lorica
Lorica is a man-made material that is lighter than leather. It is both breathable and water-repellent, however, it does not retain foot odors. As well as being tough and resistant to scratches, Lorica conforms to the shape of the foot like leather without the shoe has to be ‘broken in’. Comfort is assured.

Soft Instep Closure System
The wide, anatomical, and padded strap has been reduced and coupled to a soft, thermoformed material, increasing comfort and performance. It distributes pressure evenly over the arch area, is adjustable from both sides, and can be centered perfectly. The system is serviceable and replaceable, it also eliminates the need for using the SiDi High Instep Extender.

Caliper Buckle
The center part of the buckle is for micro-metric adjustment – lift to tighten, push to loosen. In order to completely open the buckle, both sides have to be pushed in.

Tecno II System
The Tecno II buckle uses a monofilament nylon line and a fine-tooth ratchet for smooth adjustment and even pressure distribution. The system allows frontal micro-metric closure and adapts the upper to a customised fit. The buckle is serviceable and available as a replacement part.

High-Security Velcro
Locking polymer teeth are embedded in the Velcro strap to make the closure more secure.

Adjustable Heel Retention Device
New technology for the heel-cup system. The retention device reinforces the top of the heel cup and improves fit by closing the back of the shoe more securely around the ankle. A couple of screws control how tight the top of the heel is, these can be adjusted so that the heel stays tight on any steep climb and every sprint.

SiDi Heel
The reinforced SiDi Heel keeps the foot in position and avoids the shoe from being deformed by extreme performance or prolonged pressure.

MTB SRS Carbon Sole
The revolutionary MTB SRS Carbon Sole is the ultimate sole for the high-performance, high-mileage off-road cyclist. The heart of this sole is a pure carbon insert reaching from heel to toe. This carbon insert and the replaceable tread are bolted to a nylon frame. This nylon frame is both tough and thin, designed to keep the ball of the foot close to the pedal axle.

From this design a small amount of flex is given to the toe area, however, the main body of the shoe is ultra-stiff, able to transfer the power. Excellent comfort is assured as the design gives consideration to the blood circulation in the foot.

Optional extras are available for this sole: a toe-guard to provide added protection to the front of the foot and toe spikes for extra traction off-bike.

Very strong frame, reliable parts, selling as not really using anymore.From website:‘The classic folding mountain bike from Montague, the Paratrooper is tough, rugged, and ready for anything. Its patented folding design was developed under a grant from DARPA to allow airborne soldiers to drop out of airplanes and into combat.The Paratrooper offers 24 speeds, front suspension, mechanical disc brakes, and the RackStand for hauling gear. Tackle any terrain, carry your gear, and fold to stash in your trunk.’

movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front
hub electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque.

title: 2010 GT Sensor small frame  27.5"(converted)
text:
2 x9 Groupset. 
Tubeless
WTB 27.5" rims

Fork and shock serviced within last 500km
Bike has been used, but in very good condition.
Perfect for a kid who wants to get onto a small frame dual sus bike or for someone who of small stature who wants a dual sus, bit does not want to spend a lot. 

I am personally a big fan of the I drive suspension geometry and have had 0 maintenance needs on this - it is still perfect. Coupled with the Fox fork and shock, it offers a very plush ride. Biggest plus is short, technical climbs. Biggest neg is probably that it is a bit more nervous going down hill (I enjoyed it though) and mud clearance. 

Serious offers will be considered.

title: Yeti Mountain Bike
text:
Yeti’s stiffer, more planted but still agile and pedal-friendly 575 platform is an excellent aggro trail bike. 

Yeti’s agile but confidently authoritative bike has been a favourite all-rounder for ages. It ticks all the right boxes for ripping up any sort of trail. It’s confident enough to use the whole trail and work the most radical angles, but agile enough to avoid what it can’t cope with. It also adds infectious enthusiasm, making it a near-perfect build-your-own aggro trail bike template. 

Ride & handling: Light enough to climb and charge well 

Skinny, loose, zero-tolerance singletrack trails are enough to put any bike and rider on edge.
